rename.from: quarkus-kubernetes-client: DevServicesKubernetesProcessor always shuts down cluster because of broken equals method
rename.to: [quarkus-kubernetes-client]: DevServicesKubernetesProcessor always shuts down cluster because of broken equals method

issue.title: Migrate Kubernetes Dev Service to new architecture
issue.body:
This PR migrates the Kubernetes Dev Service to the new architecture and should fix #49381 and #49405

Resolves [#47603](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/47603).

The goal is for a kube container with the same configuration to be found if running and an associated build item properly produced for the existing service so that the information from the running service can be leveraged.

/cc @LarsSven @holly-cummins @ozangunalp

body: Sorry it took this long to get this addressed, was hoping that #49944 would have addressed this by now but this is proving more complex than initially expected.
